entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 18 January 2023
